resources.string: This ID is not registered at %s. Get the ID from \"Devices\" tab of the control panel.
Select Headwind MDM as a default launcher and check \'Always\':
Error connecting to %s. Please check the Internet connection and try again.

Please allow the app to draw over other windows. A settings sheet will now be opened. Find the \"Headwind MDM\" item, allow to draw over other windows, and tap \"Back\". If you can\'t find the setting, tap \"Skip\" (the app may not work as expected!)

Please allow the app to use history. A settings sheet will now be opened. Find the \"Headwind MDM\" item, allow access to the app history, and tap \"Back\". If you can\'t find the setting, tap \"Skip\" (the app may not work as expected!)
Please allow installation from unknown sources. A settings sheet will now open. Find \"Unknown sources\", allow the installation and click \"Back\".
MIUI requires manual setup of custom permissions. App permissions window will now open. Tap \"Other permissions\", allow \"Display pop-up windows while running in the background\" and click \"Back\".

Please allow the app to work in the device administrator mode. A Settings sheet will now open. Select \"Device administrators\", find the \"Headwind MDM\" item, activate the administrator, and tap \"Back\".
Active app monitoring by Headwind MDM Launcher
Please allow the app to use accessibility services. A Settings sheet will now open. Find the \"Headwind MDM\" item, allow to use accessibility services, and tap \"Back\".
Access to this app (%s) is blocked by the administrator. Click \'Home\' to proceed.
You are allowed to change settings within 3 minutes.
Not enough rights to reboot the device.
The settings screen will open. Please turn on GPS location on this screen and click Back.
The settings screen will open. Please TURN OFF GPS location on this screen and click Back.
The settings screen will open. Please turn on mobile data on this screen and click Back.
The settings screen will open. Please TURN OFF mobile data on this screen and click Back.
Kiosk mode disabled: no permission to draw over other windows. Please allow Headwind MDM to draw over other windows.
The app encountered an internal error. Please reboot the device and retry the action.
The configuration is not set, retrying to get from the server!
Close the admin panel to check and request permissions.
Please enter a valid server URL.
Quit due to server fault! Please fix the issue and restart Headwind MDM, or remove it completely and reinstall.
The app requires the permissions to run. Please grant the requested permissions.
Cannot open the webpage because the browser is not found. Please add a browser app to the device configuration.
Invalid QR code contents. Please generate the provisioning QR code in the Headwind MDM web panel.
